<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:e7ffa2de4785f11021f49128436d43bd=true^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Car parking reservation">f64205c54709711021f49128436d433a</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

	g_form.clearValue('u_hours');
	g_form.clearValue('u_price');
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

	g_form.clearValue('u_end_dt');
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>เหมาทั้งวัน</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-05 14:01:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>42713a9247c5f11021f49128436d431b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>เหมาทั้งวัน</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_42713a9247c5f11021f49128436d431b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 17:31:34</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
